channel.title: Client Help, Please READ, NEED HELP BADD!
channel.description:
hello i have a few questions which i am confused over.
well how do i upload a copy of the client i made without all the 'character files' and 'banning' files and etc . but still i get the char files when they log on ? its sounds confusing. to put it in a basic way. i have one with char files etc. they have a different one without the char files but the same client. because i just cant work out how to do that. i have the client up and running just i cant do that :( please help it will be greatly apreciated :) also making sigs for people that help me as a reward :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 06:00:09 pm[/size][hr]I ALSO FORGOT TO ADD! how do i update peoples 'players rights' because i dont know the numbers for it. and i dont no how to update it so im owner. thankyou in advance -dylan

item.title: Client Help, Please READ, NEED HELP BADD!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

0 = Regular player
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner
4 = Hidden owner
20 = Root administrator

Read full topic
item.source: Client Help, Please READ, NEED HELP BADD!

item.title: Client Help, Please READ, NEED HELP BADD!
item.dc:creator: @tragicguy tragicguy
item.description:
@tragicguy wrote:

[quote=“Beastly¿, post:6, topic:295253”]Sometimes, Ranks aren’t like that…

0=Player
1=Moderator
2=Administrator
3=Owner
4=Hidden Administrator/Owner
5-9=Sometimes Donater, depends.

And Moderator please move this to Client Help.[/quote]

yeah i know but basics i gave him and yh

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help, Please READ, NEED HELP BADD!
item.dc:creator: @tragicguy tragicguy
item.description:
@tragicguy wrote:

ok 1st you make a copy of the folder and send that one or make a copy of what you want to save then delete the things you dont want and replace it with the copy

2nd the player rights are
0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=coder(sometimes)
10=hidden

Read full topic

item.description:
@dylanmate wrote:

hello i have a few questions which i am confused over.

well how do i upload a copy of the client i made without all the ‘character files’ and ‘banning’ files and etc . but still i get the char files when they log on ?
its sounds confusing.
to put it in a basic way.
i have one with char files etc.
they have a different one without the char files but the same client.
because i just cant work out how to do that.
i have the client up and running just i cant do that
please help it will be greatly apreciated
also making sigs for people that help me as a reward :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 06:00:09 pm[/size][hr]I ALSO FORGOT TO ADD!
how do i update peoples ‘players rights’
because i dont know the numbers for it.
and i dont no how to update it so im owner.
thankyou in advance
-dylan
